items.title: Street Fighter IV
items.description: Street Fighter IV is a 2008 fighting game published by Capcom, who also co-developed the game with Dimps.

items.title: Call of Duty: operations
items.description: Call of Duty is a first-person shooter video game franchise published by Activision.

items.title: Quake 2
items.description: Quake II is a first-person shooter video game released in December 1997.
